use.flag: Install and use default variant of JetBranins' custom JRE.
Install and use DCEVM variant of JetBranins' custom JRE.
Install and use FD variant of JetBranins' custom JRE.
Install and use JFX variant of JetBranins' custom JRE.
Install and use JCEF variant of JetBranins' custom JRE.
Install and use vanilla JetBranins' custom JRE.
